sentence: Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 16, 2016.
A cash dividend payment of $0.84 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 02, 2016.
Shareholders who purchased SHW prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 4th quarter that SHW has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $263.38, the dividend yield is 1.28%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SHW was $263.38, representing a -15.71% decrease from the 52 week high of $312.48 and a 12.1% increase over the 52 week low of $234.96.
SHW is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) and Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ).
SHW's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $11.76.
Zacks Investment Research reports SHW's forecasted earnings growth in 2016 as 10.33%, compared to an industry average of 6.1%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SHW Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
